title: Allotment patch/Patches
content:
Allotment/Flower/Herb patches[edit | edit source]

Types Location Closest teleport Image
  • Two Allotment
  • Flower
  • Herb
 South of Falador
Gardener: Elstan
  • Explorer's ring 2 or higher
  • Spirit tree to Port Sarim
  • Draynor Manor Teleport
  • Amulet of glory to Draynor Village
  • Skills necklace to Mining Guild
  • Ring of Wealth to Falador Park
  • Falador Teleport
  • Two Allotment
  • Flower
  • Herb
 West of Port Phasmatys
Gardener: Lyra
  • Fairy ring code alq
  • Ectophial
  • Fenkenstrain's Castle Teleport
  • Kharyrll Teleport
  • Charter ship to Port Phasmatys
  • Two Allotment
  • Flower
  • Herb
 North of Catherby
Gardener: Dantaera
  • Catherby Teleport
  • Camelot Teleport then run east
  • Two Allotment
  • Flower
  • Herb
 North of Ardougne
Gardener: Kragen
  • Ardougne cloak 2 or higher
  • Skills necklace to Fishing Guild
  • Fishing Guild Teleport
  • Combat bracelet to Ranging Guild
  • Quest point cape teleport
  • Fairy ring code blr
  • Ardougne Teleport
  • Two Allotment
  • Flower
  • Herb
 South-west corner of Hosidius
Gardener: Marisi
  • Xeric's talisman to Xeric's Glade
  • Hosidius portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
  • Kharedst's memoirs to Lunch by the lancalliums
  • Tithe Farm minigame teleport
  • Spirit Tree to Hosidius (with 45 Agility for the river jump shortcut)
  • Skills Necklace to Woodcutting Guild, then run east (45 Agility for the Hosidius river jump shortcut)
  • Allotment
 Harmony Island
  • Harmony Island Teleport
  • Mos le'harmless teleport scroll then talk to Brother Tranquility
  • Ectophial, run to Port Phasmatys docks and take a boat ride to Mos Le'Harmless via Bill Teach, then talk to Brother Tranquility
  • Minigame teleport to Trouble Brewing then run west to Mos le'harmless and talk to Brother Tranquility
  • Two Allotment
  • Flower
 Farming Guild
Gardener: Alan
  • Farming cape teleport
  • Skills necklace to Farming Guild
  • Spirit tree if planted in Farming Guild
  • Fairy ring code CIR, then run south-west
  • Battlefront Teleport to Battlefront, then run west
  • Two Allotment
  • Flower
 Prifddinas
Gardener: Oswallt
  • Spirit tree located north-west
  • Teleport crystal to Prifddinas
  • Prifddinas house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
  • Herb
 Roof of the Troll Stronghold
Gardener: My Arm or Drunken Dwarf's Leg
  • Stony basalt teleport (requires completion of Making Friends with My Arm)
  • Trollheim Teleport, then west
  • Redirected house tab
  • Herb
 Harmony Island
  • Harmony Island Teleport
  • Mos le'harmless teleport scroll then talk to Brother Tranquility
  • Ectophial, run to Port Phasmatys docks and take a boat ride to Mos Le'Harmless via Bill Teach. Talk to Brother Tranquility to arrive at Harmony Island
  • Minigame teleport to Trouble Brewing then run west then south to Brother Tranquility
  • Herb
 Weiss
Gardener: Boulder
  • Icy basalt
  • Fairy ring code dks, then travel on Larry's boat on the coast north-west, then run to the patch on the west side of Weiss.
  • Herb
 Farming Guild
  • Farming cape teleport
  • Skills necklace to Farming Guild
  • Spirit tree planted in the Farming Guild
  • Fairy ring code CIR, then run south-west
  • Battlefront Teleport to Battlefront, then run west

Talk to Brother Tranquility to arrive at Harmony Island *[[Minigame teleport]] to [[Trouble Brewing]] then run west then south to Brother Tranquility |[[File:Harmony Allotment location.png|212px]] | *[[Herb patch|Herb]] |[[Weiss]]
